name: Cake King's Rent Fiesta
description:
You're the royal chef and someone has stolen all your ingredients -- and the rent is due! Seek out Ingredients and Recipe Pages so you can cook up enough food to appease your landlord and live another month.

Made for InkJam 2021. Takes a second to load, plz be patient

CONTROLS
WASD: Moves
SPACE: Talk / Read / Use Cooker
E: Pick up
Q: Drop
